alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 05 at 2:32PM AKST until February 07 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Plan on areas of poor visibilities at times. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until noon Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Cold wind chills as low as 50 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
